issue.title: Created date used instead of Sent date
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

When a request is created by a user, a created_date is saved. -> OK
When the request is sent, a sent date is saved. -> OK

In various views, the displayed date is always the "created date" which is not very usefull.

The "sent date" should be displayed in every of this views :

- in BE : index.php?option=com_easysdi_shop&view=orders
- in FE : index.php?option=com_easysdi_shop&view=orders
- in FE : index.php?option=com_easysdi_shop&view=orders&layout=validation
- in FE : index.php?option=com_easysdi_shop&view=order&layout=validation
- in FE : index.php?option=com_easysdi_shop&view=order&layout=edit
- in FE : index.php?option=com_easysdi_shop&view=requests
- in FE : index.php?option=com_easysdi_shop&view=request&layout=edit

- in modules "last_request" and "last_orders"


I suggest to keep "created" as title in the various column.




**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
